*The Bots optics open and she looks around* Infectra:...where am I????.....=
..the last thing I remember I was seeing my friedns go plunging to the floo=
r and then this large bot sends this claw out at me....but......that's all =
I remember..... *She says to particular bot*
  ----- Original Message -----=
 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, June 29, 200=
0 10:50 PM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  OCC: I talked to Orchid and sh=
e said she wanted a new character to be made from Drazom, but she didn't wa=
nt it to be anything like Drazom.
   
  Train Wreck works on Drazom. He loo=
ks at all of the sparks they had in storage.

  "Now how did this one get i=
n here? This spark was never in a deathmatch!" Train Wreck said.

  "So how=
 did it get in there?" Stranato asked. Train Wreck shrugged. He took the sp=
ark, curious to find out who it is, he put it in the former body of Drazom,=
 which was remade into whatever Orchid wants it to be, whatever, it looks n=
othing like Drazom. Train Wreck and the rest of the Radicons wait for the r=
obot to come to life...
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: iloveal=
llizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 10:=
21 PM
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    (OOC: I want to bring in a new =
character. I already have an idea..)
      ----- Original Message ----- 
  =
    From: THECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Thursday, June=
 29, 2000 9:08 PM
      Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


      Stranato was co=
nfused now, this bot seemed to die sad. First he wanted to die, he should h=
ave been happy, but he seemed so sad to die, the knife had no affect, he fr=
oze to death. Stranato sighed, this was the part of his job he hated. Stran=
ato picked up Drazom's body and carried it back to the Radicon's wrecked sh=
ip, which served as their base. Stranato set Drazom's body on a table.

   =
   "Any way we can bring him back? We can reprogram him to serve us." Stran=
ato said.

      "I don't think so, his spark looks to be extinguished, sor=
ry poor fellow, we couldn't save ya." Train Wreck said.

      "I shouldn't=
 have stabbed him." Stranato said.

      "It wasn't you who killed him, he=
 froze to death, just sorry he didn't make it." Train Wreck said.

      "N=
o, you don't understand, I tried to kill him, I'm no better than the cold! =
I don't understand why I did something like that, maybe it was the cold." S=
tranato said. He sighed.

      "Maybe I'm just a son of a--"

      "No, y=
ou are acting stupid now! Your murderer curcuits blocked out your intellige=
nce circuits and your logic circuits." Train Wreck said, interupting Strana=
to.

      "I hope your right." Stranato said. Train Wreck looked at the bo=
dy.

      "We could always put a new spark in his body" Train Wreck said. =
Stranato sighed and sat in the corner.

      "We could have used him, and =
instead we let him die and didn't save him, and I tried to kill him myself.=
" Stranato said.

      OCC: Orchid, the Radicons could put a new spark fro=
m their spark collection (From deathmatches!) into Drazom's body if you wan=
t to have a new character with Drazoms body, Orchid. Orchid, I could have t=
hem change the body and you can bring in a new character without having him=
 or her look like Drazom at all, your choice, you can just have them get ri=
d of his body even, just pick something, please...
        ----- Original M=
essage ----- 
        From: ilovealllizards 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com=
 
        Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 8:37 PM
        Subject: Re: Neo Be=
ast Wars


        *The knife hit Drazom's back. He didn't scream or anythi=
ng. It was already snowing which made him even colder. Mech fluid begins po=
uring out of his back* Drazom:............ *Drazom's head hits the ground. =
It wasn't really the knife. It was coldness. Drazom's spark fades out and h=
e lies there......and mutters one word..* Drazom:....Mantella....... *Drazo=
m's optics flicker and fade out* *He lived to love....he lived to die.....T=
hat was a queston that would never be answered*





        (OOC: Please D=
razom on the Deceased bots page. as that he died from the lack of emch flui=
d and because of how cold it was)
          ----- Original Message ----- 
 =
         From: THECODE 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: T=
hursday, June 29, 2000 6:54 PM
          Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    =
      The Radicons had walked off and left Drazom, but now they were walkin=
g back and they seen him again. Airbomber laughed.

          "There's the =
guy I saved, I wonder why he wants to die?" Airbomber asked.

          "I =
don't know, but I will oblige his needs!" Stranato said. Stranato walked up=
 behind Drazom slowly. Stranato pulled out a knife, something he had stolen=
 from the People's Base, and plunged it down, the knife screaming toward Dr=
azom's back.

          Stronghold and Blender took a sip of their beer.

 =
         "Why does that guy want to die, though?" Arrow asked.

          "=
Some bots are crazy." Train Wreck said, the 5 Radicons watching Stranato...=

            ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: ilovealllizard=
s 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Wednesday, June 28=
, 2000 7:01 PM
            Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


            *Drazo=
m slowly turns his head and looks at The Radicons* Drazom:....no......I mus=
t...die for.....my stupidity...of....messing up with......Mantella..... *Dr=
azom's optics widen as he remembers something* Drazom:...hey....I'm a Pred.=
....I AM!.....kill me........*Drazom pulls hisself up by a tree limb and me=
ch fluid pours out of his side and he falls back to the ground shivering fr=
om how cold it is getting from the lack of mech fluid*
              ----- =
Original Message ----- 
              From: THECODE 
              To: nbwr=
pg@egroups.com 
              Sent: Tuesday, June 27, 2000 10:59 PM
       =
       Subject: Neo Beast Wars


              Train Wreck walked away from=
 the battle, Plintissa and Stronghold run away. Stranato, not seeing any po=
int in continuing the battle, ran off with them. Scamrock followed with a g=
runt from being outnumbered. Artist laughed and ran after them as well.

  =
            "Know what my names gonna be now? I'm going to be Blender!" Sca=
mrock said.

              "Who cares about you?" Stranato asked. Stronghol=
d reached out to grab Stranato but he cartwheeled out of the way.

        =
      "We left that idiot Arrow in your CR Chamber, Plintissa." Stronghold =
said.

              "WHAT!?" Stranato yelled.

              "It's my base=
, and Arrow is welcome to be repaired there and so are the other former Rad=
icons!" Plintissa yelled.

              The Radicons nodded and walked on,=
 Stranato grumbled out something that none of them, could understand. Airbo=
mber seen them and waved to them. The People's Base's secret passageway was=
 in the nearby swamp.

              "Get ready!" Train Wreck said to Airbo=
mber.

              "What about this guy?" Airbomber asked.

             =
 "Never mind him." Train Wreck said. Airbomber drug Drazom out of the water=
 and ushered him to come along while he walked with his comrades.

        =
      Dracona was getting furious, and so was Gangon.

              "Sorry=
 Gangon, I did all I could, maybe BrightBlade will still show up anyway." D=
racona said. Gangon waited while Dracona flew away.

              "Hey! Wa=
it! You forgot to untie meeeee!" Gangon screamed.

              Dracona di=
dn't hear and landed next to the People's Group members. The Radicons, Plin=
tissa, Dracona, and Artist all entered the Poeple's base through the secret=
 passage way, the computer reconizing them as friends. Train Wreck and Airb=
omber stepped into a door.

              "Hey, Stranato, look at this! It'=
s amazing!" Train Wreck called out. Arrow steps out of the CR Chamber all h=
ealed up.

              "Yeah, it's got lots of beer and cigars in here, t=
oo! and it's big enough to put a table in to play cards! How come we never =
noticed this room before?" Airbomber said. Stranato walked into the room. S=
tronghold and Blender followed.

              "Wait up guys!" Arrow called=
 out, running into the room. Plintissa sealed the door magnetically upon or=
der from Train Wreck, the Radicons were locked inside the room to sort out =
their problems. There was alot of banging, but it eventually stopped. Alot =
of name calling, too. Plintissa laughed and sat down at a table to play car=
ds with Dracona.

              "Oh, man! Not even a drop of beer in here! =
We'll dehydrate drinking water!" Stronghold said.

              "What are =
we going to do? Nothing to smoke!" Blender said.

              "I have mor=
e needs than all of you idiots put together! I'm getting fat and need to ex=
ercise!" Stranato yelled.

              "How come we can't all get along! =
I don't like it in here neither!" Arrow said. Stranato looked at him like h=
e was going to kill him. Arrow cowered in the corner.

              "You s=
ee? That's why you fail, Arrow, you don't stand up against Stranato and his=
 stupid rules! This was our idea!" Train Wreck yelled.

              "Yeah=
, and nobody is getting out of here until we are all friends again." Airbom=
ber said.

              Stranato sighed in disapointment. Arrow stood up a=
gain, and started pacing the room. Stronghold and Blender started to look i=
n cracks in the wall for something to drink, despite plenty of water in thi=
s room. Train Wreck was discussing something with Arrow and Airbomber, and =
Stronghold and Blender joined them before long.

              "Say, you gu=
ys, it's really lonely sitting here with nothing to do, and--"

           =
   "Shut up and get your ass over here! Of course you can join us!" Arrow s=
aid, cutting off Stranato. Stranato walks over and sits with them. Strongho=
ld pulls out a pack of playing cards.

              Plintissa and Dracona =
smile to each other and walk up and out of the secret passgeway, taking a w=
alk across a field...
